statements: DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND maintenance_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Emergency' AND equipment_id IN (SELECT equipment_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-07-01');
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE performed_by = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND maintenance_type = 'Routine';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND status = 'pending';
